text: Taras Bulba () is a 1909 Russian silent drama movie directed by Aleksandr Drankov.ТАРАС БУЛЬБА It stars Anisim Suslov, L. Manko, and D. Chernovskaya. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian silent movies Category:1909 drama movies
title: Taras Bulba (1909 movie)
